text: The Reincarnation of Peter Proud is a 1975 American psychological horror drama movie directed J. Lee Thompson and is based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Max Ehrlich. It stars Michael Sarrazin, Margot Kidder, Jennifer O'Neill, Paul Hecht. It was distributed by American International Pictures. David Fincher and Andrew Kevin Walker had announced the remake in 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 horror movies Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s psychological movies Category:American horror movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about dreams Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson Category:Movies set in Massachusetts
title: The Reincarnation of Peter Proud
